entry.title: üéâ Welcome to subscribe to App Store Discounts
entry.summary: Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!
entry.content:
Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!

About our RSS feed

  • Focused on delivering App Store app discount information
  • Whenever an app's price drops or in-app purchases go on sale, we will promptly send you a notification
  • Each app's discount information is presented in a separate feed
  • The RSS feed is completely open-source, allowing you to view, contribute, and add your favorite apps at any time

Find Us

App Store Discounts

Finally

If this project has been helpful to you, would you kindly give us a ‚≠êÔ∏è

entry.title: Luwian
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫229,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫39,99 [Free ~ ‚Ç∫249,99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫39,99

Application Description

Luwian is a sophisticated camera application designed to provide complete manual control over camera hardware, thus empowering the user to unleash their creativity using DSLR design. Additionally, the app comes with the Luwian Raw Magic Lite post-processing editor, which enhances the quality of images. The manual controls offered by Luwian include exposure, focus, focus lock, zoom, and white balance, with both preset and custom adjustment options, ISO, and shutter speed. The app also provides access to 40 filters, 29 virtual FX, 17 analog films, and 36 classic movie tones, which are all readily available on the main camera panel. Luwian is a powerful tool for both amateur and professional photographers, offering an array of features that allow them to capture stunning images with ease. Its intuitive interface ensures that users can easily navigate the app and access its features, while its manual controls enable them to exercise precise control over the camera hardware. With Luwian, photographers can capture their vision with precision and clarity, making it an ideal tool for those in the field of photography. Main Panel Features : Exposure control Focus + focus lock control Zoom White balance ISO Shutter speed Target grid Fullscreen Orientation indicator Current resolution indicator Torch mode: auto / on / off Flash mode: auto / on / off Camera switch menu Video recording switch button: Normal / Slow Motion / Time-lapse Shutter button Video recording button Dual camera recording mode (only iPhone 11 and later models) True depth backdrop camera (only iPhone 11 and later models) Shutter Timer Manual mode Auto mode Portrait mode (only iPhone 11 and later models) Analog film mode Cinetone filter mode Classic filters and VFX Menu Luwian Raw Magic Lite All Raw Magic Lite Features : Import / Select / Delete Media EXIF info and details Photo edit crop resize Video edit crop resize (BETA) Photo / Video adjust Photo / Video general filters and VFX Photo / Video analog filters Photo / Video cinetone filters All Settings Features : Photo quality setup Camera preset access and video recording FPS setup Time-lapse speed 2x to 10x Turn on and off the main panel filter view The shutter timer is set up from three sec. to 15 sec. About section and link to support page

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: Iron Marines: RTS offline game
entry.summary:
Hero Blue Dragon: ‚Ç∫299,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫229,99
Hero Ajax: ‚Ç∫129,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫39,99
Hero Mark X: ‚Ç∫299,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫229,99
Hero Fate: ‚Ç∫129,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫39,99
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • Hero Blue DragonÔºö‚Ç∫299,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫229,99 [‚Ç∫229,99 ~ ‚Ç∫299,99]
  • Hero AjaxÔºö‚Ç∫129,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫39,99 [‚Ç∫39,99 ~ ‚Ç∫129,99]
  • Hero Mark XÔºö‚Ç∫299,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫229,99 [‚Ç∫229,99 ~ ‚Ç∫299,99]
  • Hero FateÔºö‚Ç∫129,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫39,99 [‚Ç∫39,99 ~ ‚Ç∫129,99]

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫129,99

In-App Purchases

  • Hero Dr.GraffÔºö‚Ç∫129,99
  • Hero Blue DragonÔºö‚Ç∫229,99
  • Hero Sha'TraÔºö‚Ç∫129,99
  • Hero AjaxÔºö‚Ç∫39,99
  • Hero SparasÔºö‚Ç∫129,99
  • Hero RoyÔºö‚Ç∫39,99
  • Hero Mark XÔºö‚Ç∫229,99
  • Hero FateÔºö‚Ç∫39,99
  • Hero DarwinÔºö‚Ç∫39,99
  • Hero TrabucoÔºö‚Ç∫129,99

Application Description

From the creators of the award winner, Kingdom Rush saga comes the most extraordinary space odyssey. Fight challenging real-time strategy sci-fi battles on amazing and unknown planets. Command brave soldiers, mighty mechas, and powerful aliens against hordes of space monsters, swarms of insectoids, and robot armies in a galaxy far far away. PLAN, ATTACK AND BEAT ALL THE ENEMIES ADAPTING YOUR STRATEGY by changing the role of your troops even in the thick of the combat, from ranger to sniper, from flamethrowers to missile launchers. ADAPT YOUR STRATEGY by changing the role of your troops even in the thick of battle, from ranger to sniper, from flamethrowers to missile launchers. RECRUIT AND TRAIN THE GREATEST HEROES in the galaxy, lead them into dangerous territory against near-impossible odds and unleash their mighty powers and abilities. TURN THE TIDE OF BATTLE with orbital strikes, intelligent mines, support troops, turrets and a wide array of special weapons. Armies of robots, crushed starships, gigantic monsters, unknown races, brave assaults, desperate rescues, audacious sabotages... the galaxy needs your command. The galaxy needs the Iron Marines FEATURES ‚Ä¢ 21 CAMPAIGN MISSIONS across three sci fi planets. Each action-packed challenge will have you improve your strategy to save the galaxy! ‚Ä¢ 17 SPECIAL OPERATIONS that will test if you have what it takes to battle your way through space. ‚Ä¢ 40+ UPGRADES to build the ultimate RTS army! Choose between Defense Drones, Napalm Rockets, Ricocheting Blasts, Lethal Weapons and many more. ‚Ä¢ +7 UNITS to bring into battle and give your hero some extra firepower! ‚Ä¢ 8 SPECIAL WEAPONS to unleash hell on your enemies and keep expanding your tactics like space itself! What‚Äôs better than a well-placed missile? An orbital strike of 50 high-explosive missiles! ‚Ä¢ DEFEAT UNIQUE BOSSES in epic battles. They are green, mean, killing machines!!! Well‚Ä¶ some are machines and these aliens aren‚Äôt green‚Ä¶ but they‚Äôre all massive and determined to crush you. Suit up, Marines! ‚Ä¢ 70+ ACHIEVEMENTS to complete and show everyone you‚Äôre the best RTS commander in the whole galaxy! ‚Ä¢ NO WI-FI IN SPACE? No worries, offline play guaranteed! ‚Ä¢ CHOOSE YOUR DIFFICULTY MODE: Casual, Normal or Veteran. Don‚Äôt get cocky! Or Do! Your choice! ‚Ä¢ IMPOSSIBLE MODE. Only for the most daring, reckless, all-out-of-bubblegum marines in space. We dare you!

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: LMP - Music Hub
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫129,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫39,99 [‚Ç∫39,99 ~ ‚Ç∫129,99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫39,99

Application Description

Play local music or stream from a file/media server with LMP. Apple TV version included, with support for Emby, Navidrome, Plex, and Jellyfin. ‚ñ£ Import via iTunes or folder and play local tracks LMP was designed from scratch with offline music in mind. You can store music on your device in two forms: iTunes music or audio file. The first would require syncing with iTunes on Windows or Finder on Mac. To import as audio files, simply transfer them to the LMP Music folder on your device via any means. If you choose the latter, you will be able to enjoy additional features, such as editing of metadata via the LMP browser assistant. ‚ñ£ Connect to a cloud server and stream music from the server If you have insufficient storage on your device, you can also store your tracks on a server and stream from the server. File servers using SMB and WebDAV are supported. However, we recommend hosting a media server instead, via Plex, Emby, Navidrome or Subsonic due to faster import speeds. All tracks come together seamlessly, no matter how they are imported, providing a unified experience. You can enable the option in the settings to hide repeated tracks across servers. ‚ñ£ Manage playlists with ease LMP has its own playlist system that allows you to not only add tracks from all sources, but also artists. All tracks belonging to the artist would automatically be added to the playlist everytime you open the app or rescan, even newly added ones. With flexible artist splitting, you will be able to ensure that tracks get allocated to the right artist. When the AI playlist is enabled, LMP will also be able to generate a playlist for you based on your listening preferences. Usage data is only recorded if this feature is enabled, and all data recorded for this is stored locally, so you do not have to worry about data privacy. ‚ñ£ Supports CarPlay & Siri With support for CarPlay, you can start playing a playlist or control what's playing from your car's CarPlay console. Alternatively, you can also tell Siri to start playing a track or all tracks belonging to a particular artist, or use it to control the playback state of the current track. ‚ñ£ Support LRC lyrics LMP supports both embedded lyrics and .lrc files. Use the LRC or Enhanced LRC format, and the app will be able to autoscroll lyrics as the music plays. If you do not have time to add your own lyrics, you can specify the lyrics API to use, and the app will attempt to fetch lyrics of any track that is playing. ‚ñ£ Browser Assistant Manage local files on the app using the LMP browser assistant, which you can open on your computer's browser. Import new files or move/delete existing files using the Folders tool, edit music metadata using the Metadata tool or even manage your playlists using the playlists tool.

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: Streets of Rage 4
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫349,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫99,99 [‚Ç∫99,99 ~ ‚Ç∫349,99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫99,99

In-App Purchases

  • Mr. X Nightmare DLCÔºö‚Ç∫129,99

Application Description

Punch your way through the Streets of Rage once again! Streets of Rage 4 takes forward the Streets of Rage legacy in this retro beat'em up with hand-drawn comic inspired graphics and updated mechanics. Streets of Rage comes back for a sequel 25 years after the last episode : a new crime syndicate seems to have taken control of the streets and corrupted the police. All you have to fight against them is your friends... and your fists ! Critically acclaimed, Streets of Rage 4 won several awards and nominated as Best Action Games at the 2020 Game Awards. FEATURES - Rediscover the classic Beat em up Streets of Rage Franchise with new fight mechanics - Get thrilled by the Retro hand-drawn comics-inspired artistic direction by the studio behind Wonder Boy: The Dragon‚Äôs Trap serving juicy animations & vivid FX - Unlock up to 5 new & emblematic playable characters and fight your way through 12 various stages to bring back order to the streets - Challenge yourself in different modes : Story, Training, Arcade... - Listen to a new Electro OST with world class musicians such as Olivier Derivi√®re and legend Yuzo Koshiro - Get retro with up to 13 alternative retro characters, secret retro levels or choose the SoR1&2 OST and enable the Retro Pixel graphics ! * NEW MAJOR FREE UPDATE* - New co-op moves - +300 in-game improvements - Brand-new custom survival mode to the DLC (Mr. X Nightmare) - New destroyables to help to maintain the combo counter -MULTIPLAYER UPDATE- - Play online with a partner and gang up to defeat the Y twins' evil plan together! - Test your strength : hop in Battle Mode and fight your friends across your favorite levels" -Mr. X Nightmare DLC- The fight continues in Wood Oak City. After the events of Streets of Rage 4, our heroes wanted to prepare themselves for future threats. Axel, Blaze and their mates will start a very special deranged training with the help of Dr. Zan, who built an AI program from the remnants of Mister X‚Äôs brain that simulates every kind of danger they could be facing. With this DLC, get ready for: ‚Ä¢ 3 new playable characters ‚Ä¢ A new Survival mode with weekly challenges ‚Ä¢ Character customization: build your own fighting style with new moves ‚Ä¢ New weapons and enemies!o note that multiplayer mode will not be available at launch but will come in a free update after release.o note that multiplayer mode will not be available at launch but will come in a free update after release. CAREFULLY REDESIGNED FOR MOBILE - Revamped interface - Game Center achievements - iCloud - Share your progress between iOS devices - Compatible with MFicontrollers - No micro-transactions! Crack your knuckles and get ready for Streets of Rage 4 everywhere you go! If you run into a problem, please contact us at support@playdigious.mail.helpshift.com with as much information as possible on the issue, or check our FAQ at https://playdigious.helpshift.com/hc/en/6-streets-of-rage-4/

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: PlayNav - No ads in videos!
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • Premium FeaturesÔºö‚Ç∫99,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫39,99 [‚Ç∫19,99 ~ ‚Ç∫449,99]

All Price Information

PriceÔºöFree

In-App Purchases

  • Premium FeaturesÔºö‚Ç∫39,99

Application Description

Are you tired of interruptions caused by ads in your YouTube videos? The new YouTube PlayNav video browser will block all intrusive ads that appear while watching your videos, so you can enjoy your favorite videos smoothly and without interruptions. Plus, our app offers features you‚Äôll love: ‚Ä¢ On-Screen Playback: Watch YouTube videos while using other apps. ‚Ä¢ Audio-Only Mode: Listen to any YouTube video with your screen locked. ‚Ä¢ Auto Shutdown: Set a sleep timer. (Premium) ‚Ä¢ Loop Mode: Automatically repeat your favorite videos. (Premium) ‚Ä¢ Learning Mode: Learn languages using subtitles. (Premium) It also includes essential features such as playlists, speed adjustment (improved), related videos, AirPlay, and more to enhance your video-watching experience. ¬ª HOW TO USE PLAYNAV? ON-SCREEN PLAYBACK (PIP) (Premium) Watch YouTube videos while using any other app. Once activated, the player will shrink on your screen, allowing you to move or hide it with a double tap. ¬ª How to activate it? 1. While playing a video, tap the PIP icon in the upper-left corner (two small screen icons). 2. While a video is playing, swipe up from the bottom of your iPhone, and the player will appear on your screen. AUDIO-ONLY MODE Listen to the audio of your favorite YouTube videos with your iPhone screen locked. Use it while exercising, walking, or before bed. Combine it with the auto shutdown feature to relax while listening to your favorite videos! ¬ª How to activate it? 1. Enable On-Screen Playback. 2. Then, lock your iPhone, and the audio will continue playing. AUTO SHUTDOWN Bedtime? Find your favorite YouTube video or playlist, set the auto shutdown timer, and let your favorite audio accompany you as you fall asleep. ¬ª How to activate it? 1. Tap the Sleep icon (moon) in the player. 2. Select the time you want for auto shutdown. 3. You can combine it with Audio-Only Mode. LOOP MODE (REPEAT VIDEO) Want your video to play on repeat? Use Loop Mode to replay your video as many times as you like. You can also combine it with Audio-Only Mode. ¬ª How to activate it? 1. Tap the Repeat icon. Your video will keep playing on loop until you disable it. LEARN LANGUAGES WITH SUBTITLES (LEARNING MODE) Now you can learn languages using subtitles! When you activate Learning Mode, you will see both the original subtitles and the translation in your language. You can also adjust the playback speed to better understand each word. ¬ª How to activate it? 1 Search for videos in the language you are learning. 2 Once your video starts playing, tap the Learning Mode button next to the video title. ‚Äì TRY PLAYNAV NOW! ‚Äì Enjoy all basic features for free and unlock Premium with a one-time purchase. Minimum requirements: ‚Ä¢ iOS 15 or higher. ‚Ä¢ 3G connection or higher. ¬ª Related keywords: YouTube, YouTube Music, YouTube Vanced, ad blocker, no subscription, skip YouTube ads, ad-free music, block pop-ups, adblock for YouTube, block pop-up ads, ad-free content, premium ad blocker, AdBlock Plus, remove ads, YouTube without ads. - Need help? Visit: playnav.vidiom.app or contact us at info@playnav.vidiom.app Terms of Service: playnav.vidiom.app/terms-of-service Privacy Policy: playnav.vidiom.app/privacy-policy

Application Screenshot

iPhone

entry.title: Be Focused Pro- Pomodoro Timer
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫599,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫349,99 [‚Ç∫229,99 ~ ‚Ç∫599,99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫349,99

Application Description

Staying on task seems is a real challenge for our screen-bound generation. The Be Focused lets you get things done by breaking up individual tasks among discrete intervals, separated by short breaks. It‚Äôs a surprisingly effective way to retain motivation and focus. Create tasks, configure breaks and track your progress throughout the day, week or custom period. Use Be Focused on your iPhone, iPad, or Mac ‚Äî everything stays perfectly in sync. Task Management ‚Ä¢ Create and manage tasks ‚Ä¢ Add notes and due dates to tasks ‚Ä¢ Organize tasks with tags and filters ‚Ä¢ Paste task lists from other apps Timer Control ‚Ä¢ Start, pause, or skip intervals ‚Ä¢ Auto-start the next interval (optionally) ‚Ä¢ Plan intervals needed for task completion and track accuracy ‚Ä¢ Manage completed intervals Timer Customization ‚Ä¢ Set durations for work sessions, short and long breaks ‚Ä¢ Define number of intervals before a long break ‚Ä¢ Set a daily goal for completed intervals ‚Ä¢ Assign different timer settings to individual tasks Reports ‚Ä¢ View detailed reports to monitor your progress ‚Ä¢ Export your data in CSV format Sounds and Notifications ‚Ä¢ Chronometer ticking sound with adjustable frequency ‚Ä¢ Variety of alarm sounds ‚Ä¢ Interactive notifications ‚Ä¢ Adjustable volume for alarms and chronometer Integration ‚Ä¢ Sync across all your devices (iPhone, iPad, Mac) * ‚Ä¢ Integration with Focus Matrix to manage tasks using urgent/important principle ** ‚Ä¢ Integration with Shortcuts app to automate workflow Quick Access ‚Ä¢ Widgets for Lock Screen and Home Screen ‚Ä¢ Live activities for Lock Screen and Dynamic Island ‚Ä¢ Control to start or stop the timer from the Lock Screen, Controls Center, or Action Button Automation ‚Ä¢ Integration with Shortcuts app (control tasks and timers via Shortcuts app) ‚Ä¢ Automate Shortcuts execution on events in Be Focused app Device Support ‚Ä¢ Apple Watch support ‚Ä¢ Also available for Mac ‚Ä¢ Dark and Light mode support * Sync with Mac requires Be Focused Pro for macOS, sold separately. ** Integration with Focus Matrix requires the Pro version of Focus Matrix, sold separately.

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: Luwian
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫249,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫229,99 [Free ~ ‚Ç∫249,99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫229,99

Application Description

Luwian is a sophisticated camera application designed to provide complete manual control over camera hardware, thus empowering the user to unleash their creativity using DSLR design. Additionally, the app comes with the Luwian Raw Magic Lite post-processing editor, which enhances the quality of images. The manual controls offered by Luwian include exposure, focus, focus lock, zoom, and white balance, with both preset and custom adjustment options, ISO, and shutter speed. The app also provides access to 40 filters, 29 virtual FX, 17 analog films, and 36 classic movie tones, which are all readily available on the main camera panel. Luwian is a powerful tool for both amateur and professional photographers, offering an array of features that allow them to capture stunning images with ease. Its intuitive interface ensures that users can easily navigate the app and access its features, while its manual controls enable them to exercise precise control over the camera hardware. With Luwian, photographers can capture their vision with precision and clarity, making it an ideal tool for those in the field of photography. Main Panel Features : Exposure control Focus + focus lock control Zoom White balance ISO Shutter speed Target grid Fullscreen Orientation indicator Current resolution indicator Torch mode: auto / on / off Flash mode: auto / on / off Camera switch menu Video recording switch button: Normal / Slow Motion / Time-lapse Shutter button Video recording button Dual camera recording mode (only iPhone 11 and later models) True depth backdrop camera (only iPhone 11 and later models) Shutter Timer Manual mode Auto mode Portrait mode (only iPhone 11 and later models) Analog film mode Cinetone filter mode Classic filters and VFX Menu Luwian Raw Magic Lite All Raw Magic Lite Features : Import / Select / Delete Media EXIF info and details Photo edit crop resize Video edit crop resize (BETA) Photo / Video adjust Photo / Video general filters and VFX Photo / Video analog filters Photo / Video cinetone filters All Settings Features : Photo quality setup Camera preset access and video recording FPS setup Time-lapse speed 2x to 10x Turn on and off the main panel filter view The shutter timer is set up from three sec. to 15 sec. About section and link to support page

Application Screenshot

iPhone

entry.title: Day R Premium
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • Handful of capsÔºö‚Ç∫99,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫39,99 [‚Ç∫39,99 ~ ‚Ç∫99,99]

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫129,99

In-App Purchases

  • Handful of capsÔºö‚Ç∫39,99
  • Pile of capsÔºö‚Ç∫229,99
  • Sausepan of capsÔºö‚Ç∫449,99
  • Special packÔºö‚Ç∫229,99
  • Small packÔºö‚Ç∫39,99
  • Great packÔºö‚Ç∫449,99
  • Useful packÔºö‚Ç∫129,99
  • Standart packÔºö‚Ç∫99,99
  • Case with capsÔºö‚Ç∫899,99
  • Survival kitÔºö‚Ç∫39,99

Application Description

Survive in post-nuclear USSR: defeat diseases, hunger and enemies! Play Online also! Survive with other players together. Benefits of Premium version: - Unique pet Raven - Starter Kit - Caches of useful items in shelters - Expanded selection of perks - Chat without any limitations - Reduced waiting time between parcels - Access to all kinds and colors of map markers Can you survive in the world destroyed after a nuclear war? With radiation, hunger and diseases around you. You have to cross the whole country and save your family. Who knows if they are alive, or maybe radiation and deadly virus have already reached them? Reveal a secret of the apocalypse and get your memories back during a journey across the huge territory of the USSR in the 80th. It is not easy to survive after apocalypse. You'll face the real hungry games! Monsters, zombie, thirst, uncountable diseases and injuries, blood-thirsty enemies ‚Äì you have to fight it all. Craft all your resources: weapons, clothes, means of transport. - Hardcore survival: Hunger, zombie and radiation won't give you a chance to relax. - Realistic world: The turn of the seasons, huge map of USSR and more than 2500 different towns and cities. Hunt animals, but be careful: even rats can injure you seriously! Explore the wilderness! - A lot of opportunities: Multicraft, obtaining skills, hundreds of crafting schemes, a lot of ammunition. - People and stories: Interesting quests and helpful allies. An open game world. - Improve your skills: Mechanics, medicine, chemistry and many others. - Cooperative mode: The Online mode with a chat room, exchange of items and united fightings. Multiplayer survival game. Explore the abandoned houses and shelters. Find weapon and build transport using various materials. Remember everything you learnt on chemistry and physics! It is the most realistic surviving game! Features: - –°raft system ‚Äì get resources, hunt, find useful objects or weapon and create your own one! - Hardcore simulator of survival - Journey across the wilderness map in the multiplayer mode - Choose the difficulty mode: sandbox, real life or online War never changes. In 1985 USSR went down before an unknown enemy. In a few days the entire country became a radioactive wasteland - violence, hunger and diseases reign here now. When you no longer loose in the fight with the death, the other survivors wait for you in the cooperative - the Online mode let you survive together dealing with difficulties, talking in the chat room and sending gifts to each other. User agreement: http://tltgames.ru/license-agreement-en

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: All In One Memo
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫179,99 ‚Üí Free [Free ~ ‚Ç∫179,99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

Application Description

Application Description

Experience and control your Apple Home in a whole new way with Controller for HomeKit. Our app combines all the familiar HomeKit features with numerous additional enhancements, offering you a user-friendly interface, unparalleled control, and flexibility. * FLOOR PLAN: Create a detailed floor plan of your home using the LiDAR sensor on your iPhone or iPad and control your HomeKit accessories directly through the floor plan. * COMPLEX AUTOMATIONS: Utilize advanced triggers and conditions for custom automations that are perfectly tailored to your needs. * NOTIFICATIONS: Create custom notifications to stay informed about important events in your home. * BACKUPS: Secure your setup and restore it easily when needed. * SMART FOLDERS: Organize your devices and automations effortlessly with smart folders and custom filters. * WORKFLOWS: Optimize your daily routines with workflows that go beyond the capabilities of Apple Home. * SETUP CODES: Securely store your HomeKit and Matter codes in the app, so they are always at hand and never lost. * MAINTENANCE: Keep track of your setup, quickly identifying which batteries need to be replaced, which devices are unreachable, or which automations are broken. * LOGS: Monitor all activities and changes in your smart home. * WIDGETS: Control your devices faster and easier with convenient widgets or quickly jump into your floor plan. Unlock the full potential of your smart home with Controller for HomeKit. Download the app now and experience how simple and intuitive home automation can be. For more information, visit our website: https://www.controllerforhomekit.com Privacy Policy: https://controllerforhomekit.com/privacy-en/ Terms of Use: https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/
